GENERAL.name: General
GENERAL.description: The broad general unclassified level suitable for anything openly unclassified, routine, not requiring special controls.
GENERAL.handling: No special handling requirements. Standard system access controls apply.

U-PUBLIC.name: Unclassified Public
U-PUBLIC.description: Intended for material that is still unclassified but suitable for public dissemination, documentation, public website assets, etc.

U-INTERNAL.name: Unclassified Internal
U-INTERNAL.description: Organizational level unclassified information. Internal-use unclassified information that is still above the purely  sensitive level. This covers items where integrity matters more strongly (engineering docs, config examples, internal processes).

CUI.name: Controlled Unclassified Information
CUI.description: Information requiring safeguarding or dissemination controls under U.S. law, regulation, or government policy. This is the base CUI level to which specific categories may be attached.
CUI.handling: Mark clearly as CUI. Enforce access restrictions. Use approved storage, transport, and encryption. Ensure auditing and accountability.

CUI.name: Controlled Unclassified Information
CUI.description: Baseline Controlled Unclassified Information. Represents information subject to safeguarding or dissemination controls per law, regulation, or policy.
CUI.handling: Must be stored, transmitted, and shared only with authorized users. Must be encrypted when leaving controlled environments. Apply CUI markings.

CUI//AGR.name: Agriculture
CUI//AGR.description: Information related to agriculture, farming, livestock, food production, and agricultural chemicals requiring controlled handling.

CUI//AGR/AMNT.name: Ammonium Nitrate
CUI//AGR/AMNT.description: Information related to the manufacture, storage, distribution, or use of ammonium nitrate, including safety and regulatory data.

CUI//AGR/CHEM.name: Agricultural Chemicals
CUI//AGR/CHEM.description: Information related to agricultural chemicals such as pesticides, herbicides, fertilizers, and their regulated use.

CUI//CRIT.name: Critical Infrastructure
CUI//CRIT.description: Information related to the protection, operation, or vulnerability of critical infrastructure systems and assets.

CUI//CRIT/CEII.name: Critical Energy Infrastructure Information
CUI//CRIT/CEII.description: Information about energy sector infrastructure (generation, transmission, pipelines, etc.) that could be misused to disrupt services or compromise safety.

CUI//CRIT/DCRIT.name: DoD Critical Infrastructure
CUI//CRIT/DCRIT.description: Information concerning Department of Defense critical infrastructure, including facilities, systems, and supporting assets.

CUI//CRIT/EMGT.name: Emergency Management
CUI//CRIT/EMGT.description: Information related to emergency management planning, response, recovery, and coordination activities.

CUI//CRIT/ISVI.name: Information Systems Vulnerability Information
CUI//CRIT/ISVI.description: Details about weaknesses, vulnerabilities, or exploitation paths in information systems or networks (e.g., vulnerability reports, scans) that require protection to avoid aiding adversaries.

CUI//CRIT/PHYS.name: Physical Security
CUI//CRIT/PHYS.description: Information related to physical security measures, vulnerabilities, or protection of facilities and assets.

CUI//CRIT/WATER.name: Water Assessments
CUI//CRIT/WATER.description: Information related to assessments of drinking water systems and water infrastructure, including treatment, distribution, and vulnerability data.

CUI//CTI.name: Controlled Technical Information (Defense)
CUI//CTI.description: Technical information (e.g., engineering, technical data, software) with military or space application that requires protection under specific defense-related regulations or contracts.

CUI//CTI/EXPT.name: Export Controlled
CUI//CTI/EXPT.description: Information subject to U.S. export control laws such as ITAR or EAR. This includes technical data, software, or other information whose transfer to foreign persons or countries is restricted.

CUI//CTI/EXPTR.name: Export Controlled Research
CUI//CTI/EXPTR.description: Research data that falls under export control, often arising in academic or R&D contexts where results could be export-controlled.

CUI//FNC.name: General Financial Information
CUI//FNC.description: Financial information requiring protection, including regulated financial records and compliance-related data.

CUI//GOVT.name: Government
CUI//GOVT.description: Information related to government operations, processes, and official activities requiring controlled handling.

CUI//GOVT/LEGL.name: Legal
CUI//GOVT/LEGL.description: Attorney-client privileged information, legal analyses, litigation strategy, or regulatory investigation details requiring controlled distribution.

CUI//GOVT/LMI.name: Legislative Materials
CUI//GOVT/LMI.description: Information related to legislative materials, including non-public legislative records and supporting documents.

CUI//LEI.name: Law Enforcement Information
CUI//LEI.description: Information related to law enforcement activities, investigations, operations, and sensitive records.

CUI//NNPI.name: Naval Nuclear Propulsion Information (Defense)
CUI//NNPI.description: Information concerning naval nuclear propulsion systems and technology protected by statute.

CUI//OPSEC.name: Operations Security (Intelligence)
CUI//OPSEC.description: Information whose uncontrolled exposure would undermine operational security (e.g., patterns revealing how an organization operates, schedules, specific capabilities).

CUI//PRIVACY.name: General Privacy
CUI//PRIVACY.description: Personally identifiable information requiring protection from unauthorized disclosure under privacy laws and policy.
CUI//PRIVACY.handling: Encrypt in transit and at rest. Prevent unnecessary distribution. Apply Privacy Act or SORN constraints if applicable.

CUI//PRIVACY/CONTRACT.name: Contract Use
CUI//PRIVACY/CONTRACT.description: Personally identifiable information collected or used in the context of contractual relationships.

CUI//PRIVACY/DREC.name: Death Records
CUI//PRIVACY/DREC.description: Information contained in death records that is protected from public disclosure.

CUI//PRIVACY/GENETIC.name: Genetic Information
CUI//PRIVACY/GENETIC.description: Information about genetic tests or characteristics (DNA, inherited traits) that are individually identifiable and protected.

CUI//PRIVACY/HEALTH.name: Health
CUI//PRIVACY/HEALTH.description: Health-related information associated with identifiable individuals that requires privacy protection.

CUI//PRIVACY/MIL.name: Military Personnel Records
CUI//PRIVACY/MIL.description: Personnel data for military members that requires safeguarding (assignments, performance, non-public details, etc.).

CUI//PRIVACY/PERS.name: Personnel Records
CUI//PRIVACY/PERS.description: Similar to MIL but broader: personnel records for non-military staff or employees.

CUI//PRIVACY/PRIIG.name: Inspector General Protected
CUI//PRIVACY/PRIIG.description: Personally identifiable information protected in the context of Inspector General activities.

CUI//PRIVACY/STUD.name: Student Records
CUI//PRIVACY/STUD.description: Education records related to identifiable students that are protected by privacy requirements.

CUI//PROCURE.name: Procurement and Acquisition
CUI//PROCURE.description: Information related to government procurement and acquisition activities requiring controlled handling.

CUI//PROPIN.name: General Proprietary Business Information
CUI//PROPIN.description: Proprietary business information provided to the government that is protected from unauthorized disclosure.

CUI//PROT.name: Temporary Protected Status (Immigration)
CUI//PROT.description: Information related to individuals granted Temporary Protected Status under immigration law.

CUI//PSEC.name: Secrecy Orders (Patent)
CUI//PSEC.description: Information subject to patent secrecy orders restricting disclosure of certain inventions.

CUI//RAIL.name: Railroad Safety Analysis Records
CUI//RAIL.description: Information related to railroad safety analysis, inspections, or incident assessments.

CUI//TAX.name: Federal Taxpayer Information
CUI//TAX.description: Federal taxpayer information protected from unauthorized disclosure under tax law.
